seo.title: Import data from the Ethereum blockchain into MongoDB and ElasticSearch.
seo.description: Import blocks and transactions from the Ethereum blockchain into MongoDB and ElasticSearch using Geth or Infura. Can be used as a graphical application (JavaFX) or on the command line. Also supports Hazelcast, CQEngine and an in-memory format so it can be used as a library.

text.heading: Etherum Importer
text.subheading: Import utility for Ethereum blockchain data.

hints.title: Commandline
hints.content: Using the commandline mode in the importer you are able to automate tasks using your favorite scripting language.

hints.title: Accessible
hints.content: With an user friendly interface anyone can be a data scientist on the Ethereum blockchain.

hints.title: Up-to-date
hints.content: We aim to always stay up to date with the latest Geth and ElasticSearch, making sure your data flows are uninterrupted!

features.content: If you have any suggestions for improvements please open an issue in the github repository.

instructions.start: Start the application with any of the following,
instructions.end:
--import starts the importer from the configuration.
--gui starts the graphical user interface.
